っ切り: (っきり) - only/just; (usu. in a negative sentence) since/after; remaining (in a particular state)
っ子: (っこ) - someone with a liking or characteristic; a true representative of (place)
っ放し: (っはなし) - keep ...-ing (negative nuance, with the state being improper, unpleasant, etc.); have been ...-ing; leaving (something) on; leaving (something) still in use
っ限り: (っきり) - only/just; (usu. in a negative sentence) since/after; remaining (in a particular state)
つ: (つ) - (form: ...つ...つ)  indicates two contrasting actions; indicates possessive (often found in place names and compound words)
つい: (つい) - just (now); quite (near); unintentionally/unconsciously/by mistake/against one's better judgement (judgment)
ついこの間: (ついこのあいだ) - just the other day; quite recently
ついさっき: (ついさっき) - just now; a little while back; a short time ago
ついつい: (tsuitsui) - involuntariamente, inconscientemente, por engano, descuidadamente, contra o próprio julgamento
ついて回る: (ついてまわる) - to follow around
ついでだから: (ついでだから) - might as well
つうっと: (ツーッと) - (つうっと is emphatic) quickly; smoothly
つうと: (ツーッと) - (つうっと is emphatic) quickly; smoothly
つかえつかえ: (つっかえつっかえ) - haltingly; stutteringly
つかず離れず: (つかずはなれず) - maintaining a reasonable distance; neutral position; indecision
つかず離れずの態度: (つかずはなれずのたいど) - neutral attitude
つかみ出す: (つかみだす) - to take out/to take a handful of/to grab and throw; to turn someone out (of house, room, etc.)
つかみ取る: (つかみとる) - to grasp; to get
つかみ所: (つかみどころ) - point (of a conversation, etc.)/sense; hold/grip
つかみ所がない: (つかみどころがない) - vague; fuzzy; elusive; slippery
つかみ所のない: (つかみどころのない) - vague; fuzzy; elusive; slippery
つき出し: (つきだし) - protrusion/projection; (Japanese) hors d'oeuvre/appetizer/snacks; {sumo} (winning technique of) pushing out of the ring
つき出る: (つきでる) - to project; to stick out; to stand out
つき刺す: (つきさす) - to stab; to pierce; to thrust
つき合い: (つきあい) - association; socializing; socialising; fellowship
つき合う: (つきあう) - to associate with/to keep company with/to go out with/to go steady with/to get on with; to go along with/to follow someone's lead/to accompany someone/to compromise
つき従う: (つきしたがう) - to follow; to accompany; to cleave to; to join up with; to obey implicitly; to flatter
つき指: (つきゆび) - jamming a finger (e.g. with a ball)
つぎ込む: (つぎこむ) - to invest in; to sink money into; to put into; to lay out (funds); to inject; to impregnate; to infuse; to instill; to implant; to imbue; to focus (attention, efforts)
つくつく法師: (ツクツクボウシ) - Meimuna opalifera (species of cicada)
つくねんと: (つくねんと) - absentmindedly/vacantly/blankly; by oneself/all alone
つくり出す: (つくりだす) - to manufacture/to produce/to raise (crops); to invent/to dream up/to create
つくり直す: (つくりなおす) - to remake; to rebuild
つけっ放し: (つけっぱなし) - leaving a device on (e.g. TV, air conditioner); leaving something engaged (e.g. a key in a lock)
つけ入る: (つけいる) - to take advantage of; to impose on
つけ加える: (つけくわえる) - to add one thing to another
つけ毛: (つけげ) - hairpiece; hair filler; artificial hair; wig
つけ爪: (つけづめ) - artificial fingernail; fake fingernail
つけ込む: (つけこむ) - to take advantage of/to impose on; to make an entry (in an account book)
つけ麺: (つけめん) - cold Chinese noodles accompanied by soup for dipping
つち吉: (つちよし) - earth form of "good luck" character
つっかえつっかえ: (つっかえつっかえ) - haltingly; stutteringly
つっと: (ツーッと) - (つうっと is emphatic) quickly; smoothly
つつ: (つつ) - (after the -masu stem of a verb)  while; even though/despite
つつある: (つつある) - (with masu stem) to be doing; to be in the process of doing
つつき回す: (つつきまわす) - to poke something around
つつも: (つつも) - (after the -masu stem of a verb)  even though; despite
つづら折: (つづらおり) - (yoji) winding; meandering; sinuous; zigzag
つづら折り: (つづらおり) - (yoji) winding; meandering; sinuous; zigzag
つづり方: (つづりかた) - (way of) literary composition; (way of) spelling; school composition
つなぎ合わせる: (つなぎあわせる) - to connect; to join; to join or tie or knot together
つなぎ止める: (つなぎとめる) - to tie; to fasten; to hitch; to secure (e.g. load, patronage of customers, etc.); to hold on to
つなぎ目: (tsunagime) - junção, ligação, nó, ponto de conexão
つなぎ融資: (つなぎゆうし) - bridge loan; relief or emergency loan
つばぜり合い: (つばぜりあい) - locking sword to sword (in a duel) and pushing; group of close competitors/fierce competition
つば迫り合い: (つばぜりあい) - locking sword to sword (in a duel) and pushing; group of close competitors/fierce competition
つぶしが利く: (つぶしがきく) - to be valuable as scrap; to be able to do other work; to have marketable skills
つぶし島田: (つぶししまだ) - type of woman's hairdo (Edo period)
つぶし餡: (つぶしあん) - slightly crushed sweetened red-bean paste
つぶ貝: (つぶがい) - whelk (esp. Neptunea and Buccinum spp.)
つぼ焼き: (つぼやき) - shellfish cooked in its own shell (esp. turban shell); food cooked in a crockpot
つまみ上げる: (つまみあげる) - to take a pinch of something (e.g. salt); to pick up in one's fingers
つまみ菜: (つまみな) - rape seedlings; pinched-off vegetable seedlings; young edible greens
つまみ食い: (tsumamigui) - comer com os dedos; pegar comida às escondidas, comida tomada às escondidas, comer secretamente, comida tomada e comida antes da refeição começar; desfalque, apropriação indevida, explorar algo; flertar
つまらない物ですが: (つまらないものですが) - It's not much, but...; phrase used when giving gifts
つまる処: (つまるところ) - in short; in brief; to sum up; ultimately; in the end; in the long run; when all is said and done; what it all comes down to; when you get right down to it
つまる所: (つまるところ) - in short; in brief; to sum up; ultimately; in the end; in the long run; when all is said and done; what it all comes down to; when you get right down to it
つま先: (tsumasaki) - dedos dos pés, pontas dos dedos dos pés, bico de sapato, meia, etc.
つま先上がり: (つまさきあがり) - uphill path; path or slope that becomes slowly steeper
つま先立ち: (つまさきだち) - standing on tiptoes
つま先立つ: (つまさきだつ) - to stand on tiptoes
つみ重ねる: (つみかさねる) - to pile up; to accumulate
つむじ曲がり: (つむじまがり) - perversity; cantankerous; eccentric
つめに火をともす: (つめにひをともす) - to lead a stingy life; to scrimp and save; to pinch pennies; to light one's fingernail (instead of a candle)
つめ見出し: (つめみだし) - thumb index (e.g. in a dictionary)
つめ込む: (つめこむ) - to cram; to stuff; to jam; to squeeze; to compress; to pack; to crowd
つもりである: (つもりである) - to intend; (after past tense of verb) to be sure that
